author: Whitney Phillips
title: Lies About Covid-19 Might Be Deadly, But They're Not Unique
description: When this is over, a return to “normal” for content moderation would be a huge mistake.
content: Its great that Facebook, Twitter, and other large social media companies are doing what theyre doing to prevent the spread of misinformation around Covid-19. Sure, Facebook is still ignoring whats shared in private groups and has co-hosted a town hall with Fo… [+5338 chars]
